enterprise.hero.title: Professional presentation building, tailored to your brand.
enterprise.hero.subtitle: Easily apply your corporate identity and design across all your company’s presentations. Secure distribution and maintenance.
enterprise.hero.quote: Did you see Bob’s presentation? He used the wrong logo, again
enterprise.hero.templates.title: Templates and options that match your CI/CD.
enterprise.hero.templates.unlike: Unlike any other editor for presentations, DeckDeckGo assists you in applying your corporate identity to your company's presentations.
enterprise.hero.templates.custom: The design, colors, fonts, styles and any other options you are defining in your templates are those your collaborators are using.
enterprise.hero.templates.together: Together with your designers, we create unbreakable slides that match your design systems.
enterprise.hero.templates.uptodate: Moreover, rolling out new design and logo has never been so easy and DeckDeckGo can offer so much more.
enterprise.features.enterprise.only.noti: Above features identified with an "enterprise" icon are available upon request for organizations.
enterprise.features.main.title: Main features
enterprise.features.main.edit.title: Edit anywhere
enterprise.features.main.edit.content: The editor is available anywhere, it is a Progressive Web App!
enterprise.features.main.showcase.title: Showcase, everywhere
enterprise.features.main.showcase.conten: Presentations, work on computers, phones, tablets and more. They are published as standalone apps.
enterprise.features.main.privacy.title: Privacy, per default
enterprise.features.main.privacy.content: Your, presentations and content are private. You can choose to share them publicly anytime, but that's your choice.
enterprise.features.main.share.title: Share, standalone apps
enterprise.features.main.share.content: Your, presentation are published as standalone Progressive Web Apps. Share them by sending your colleagues and friends a link.
enterprise.features.main.push.title: Push, to GitHub
enterprise.features.main.push.content: Get, the source code of your apps pushed automatically to your GitHub repos.
enterprise.features.main.privatelinks.co: Create, private links to prevent access to your published content.
enterprise.features.main.pdf.title: Export, to PDF
enterprise.features.main.pdf.content: If, you like PDFs more than apps.
enterprise.features.main.polls.title: Polls
enterprise.features.main.polls.content: Engage, with your audience in real time. Get them involved during your presentations with their smartphones and show live results.
enterprise.features.main.offline.title: Offline
enterprise.features.main.offline.content: Present, and edit your presentation offline.
enterprise.features.edit.title: Editing
enterprise.features.edit.unbreakable.con: Apply your design, colors, fonts, styles and any other options to your templates. Those will be used by all your collaborators.
enterprise.features.edit.code.title: Highlighted code
enterprise.features.edit.code.content: Show syntax highlighted code in beautiful terminal cards.
enterprise.features.edit.embed.title: Embed your products
enterprise.features.edit.embed.content: If your products are made with the web too, embed these directly in your slides.
enterprise.features.edit.library.title: Cloud library
enterprise.features.edit.library.content: All data (text, images, etc) you upload are saved in your personal cloud storage and available to all slides.
enterprise.features.edit.youtube.title: YouTube
enterprise.features.edit.youtube.content: Embed YouTube videos easily. Play and pause through the remote control.
enterprise.features.edit.unsplashtenor.c: Search and integrate stock photos and GIFs.
enterprise.features.edit.googlefonts.con: Select a Google Font from a list we have preselected for you.
enterprise.features.edit.fullscreen.cont: No more switch to make a quick change, your slides are editable in full screen mode as well.
enterprise.features.edit.transition.cont: Make individual text elements appear one after the other.
enterprise.features.edit.math.title: Math
enterprise.features.edit.math.content: Render Math formulas with Katex in your slides.
enterprise.features.edit.charts.title: Charts
enterprise.features.edit.charts.content: Plot simple lines, area, bar, pie or donut charts.
enterprise.features.presenting.title: Presenting
enterprise.features.presenting.remote.co: Control, your presentations remotely, draw over your slides and set a timer from your phone or tablet.
enterprise.features.presenting.notes.con: Write, notes for your slides. Cherry on top, Markdown is supported.
enterprise.features.enterprise.title: More, for Enterprise
enterprise.features.enterprise.housing.c: Integrate, DeckDeckGo into your private infrastructure and networks.
enterprise.features.enterprise.domain.co: Publish your decks under your own domain name.
Propagate, your corporate design improvements to all your presentations.
enterprise.features.enterprise.archive.c: List, and find all your presentations in a single place.
enterprise.features.enterprise.collabora: Multiple users can edit a presentation at the same time.
enterprise.features.enterprise.library.c: Organize your company's media library and share it with your teams.
enterprise.features.enterprise.support.c: Your inquiries have the highest priorities.
enterprise.features.developers.title: Developers
enterprise.features.developers.kit.title: Developer Kit
enterprise.features.developers.kit.conte: Would you rather prepare your presentation with HTML or Markdown? All public features used by our editor are available as a developer kit.
enterprise.features.developers.opensourc: DeckDeckGo is open source. All code of our applications and components are available on GitHub. We encourage enterprise to adopt this approach but we do understand if you prefer to keep your corporate templates private.
enterprise.contact.inquiry: Get in touch for a tailored discussion about your needs and pricing.
enterprise.contact.name: Your name *
